attributes.title: History Has Its Eyes On You ‚≠êÔ∏è
attributes.review:
I am sad to say, that I am not Satisfied with this application. In originally reviewing this application, I was unconscious of its errors.

In reviewing the basic information for this application, I thought it sensible of me to download it, so I could better understand the subject of politics. Though, after actually downloading it, and actually going through it, I became aware of what I, originally, had missed. What‚Äôd I Miss? I missed to acknowledge just how many errors the application possessed. I neglected to, throughly, read through the reviews, and realize just how many people were having the same issues that I was.

The application kept glitching, and I have to say, the longer I was on it, it became increasingly difficult to navigate. There was a point where it was glitching Non-Stop for several minutes. My mobile phone itself has, in fact, started glitching and acting up‚Äîit was not doing this prior to downloading this application. I, sincerely, hope this does not last.

I was willing to Wait For It to become  compliant, but, alas, it did no such thing. So, I made the decision to discard the application from my mobile phone, all-together. However, while downloading it was easy, deleting it was harder. It seemed to do nothing as I repeatedly tapped the ‚ÄúDelete App‚Äù button. I was Helpless. I finally had to get a friend to help me; they finally were able to discard the application from my mobile phone.

As I said before, after finally reviewing the reviews for this application, I realized I was not the only one with these problems. So, please tell the developers to rise up, and look closely at the application‚Äôs issues, so the faults of its incompetent abilities will, hopefully soon be, consigned to oblivion, before anyone else downloads this application, and goes through the same problems.
